channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices with Exynos chipsets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices with Exynos chipsets

item.title: CVE-2022-23431|2024-08-03T03:43:45.920Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices%20with%20exynos%20chipsets
item.description: An improper boundary check in RPMB ldfw prior to SMR Feb-2022 Release 1 allows arbitrary memory write and code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-23428|2024-08-03T03:43:45.247Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices%20with%20exynos%20chipsets
item.description: An improper boundary check in eden_runtime hal service prior to SMR Feb-2022 Release 1 allows arbitrary memory write and code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-23432|2024-08-03T03:43:45.985Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices%20with%20exynos%20chipsets
item.description: An improper input validation in SMC_SRPMB_WSM handler of RPMB ldfw prior to SMR Feb-2022 Release 1 allows arbitrary memory write and code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-25819|2024-08-03T04:49:43.402Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices%20with%20exynos%20chipsets
item.description: OOB read vulnerability in hdcp2 device node prior to SMR Mar-2022 Release 1 allow an attacker to view Kernel stack memory.
